mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_GDS300(GDS_CD,GDS_ST_PRICE,UNIT_PRICE,ACT_ST_TIME,ACT_ED_TIME,CONTENT,GDS_CD_DETAIL,IMG1,IMG2,IMG3,IMG4,REG_DT) VALUES((SELECT CONCAT(#{gdsCd},(MAX(LPAD(SEQ,6,0)))) FROM SEQ_GDS100 a),#{gdsStPrice},#{unitPrice},DATE_FORMAT(#{actStTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'),DATE_FORMAT(#{actEdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'),#{content},#{gdsCdDetail},#{img1},#{img2},#{img3},#{img4},DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d'))
